name: Office Supplies
description: Stationery, paper, pens, binders, and all daily office consumables. We supply everything your office needs for smooth day-to-day operations, sourced from trusted brands with guaranteed quality.

name: Office Furniture
description: Desks, chairs, shelving units, and complete office interior solutions. We provide ergonomic, durable furniture tailored to professional environments — from executive offices to open-plan workspaces.

name: IT Consumables
description: Ink cartridges, toners, cables, peripherals, and computer accessories. Keep your technology running with high-quality consumables compatible with all major brands and equipment.

name: Laboratory Consumables
description: Reagents, glassware, protective equipment, and laboratory supplies for research facilities, hospitals, and healthcare institutions. Certified products meeting international standards.

name: General Hardware
description: Tools, fasteners, fittings, and hardware supplies for maintenance, repairs, and construction works. Reliable products for every type of technical and manual project.

name: Cleaning & Hygiene Products
description: Detergents, disinfectants, soaps, and hygiene supplies for offices, institutions, and large-scale operations. Professional-grade products ensuring clean, safe environments.

name: Food Products
description: Staple food items and provisions for institutions, cafeterias, and humanitarian operations. Quality food products sourced and delivered with full respect for health and safety standards.

name: NFI Kits (Non-Food Items)
description: Non-Food Item kits for humanitarian aid, emergency relief, and development projects. Complete kits assembled and delivered according to international humanitarian standards.

name: Market Gardening Products
description: Inputs and supplies for vegetable and market garden cultivation — fertilizers, plant protection products, and growing accessories adapted to Central African conditions.

name: Vegetable & Food Crop Seeds
description: Certified seeds with excellent germination rates, specially selected for Central African growing conditions. High-yield varieties for both subsistence and commercial farming.

name: Agricultural Tools
description: Hand tools, wheelbarrows, sprayers, and equipment for field cultivation and agricultural activities. Durable, practical tools built for intensive use in farming environments.

name: Automotive Spare Parts
description: Spare parts and components for light vehicles, 4x4 fleet, and transport vehicles. Original and compatible parts with quality guarantees for all makes and models.

name: Truck Tires
description: Heavy-duty tires for trucks and transport vehicles of all capacities. Reliable tires for long-distance hauling, construction sites, and demanding road conditions.

name: Drilling Materials & Equipment
description: Pipes, pumps, casings, and specialized equipment for water drilling and borehole projects. Complete technical solutions for water access infrastructure.

name: Building Construction
description: Construction of residential, commercial, and institutional buildings to specification. End-to-end project management from design assistance through to handover.

name: Public Works (BTP)
description: Road works, drainage, infrastructure, and civil engineering projects. Comprehensive Building and Public Works services meeting government and institutional requirements.

name: Vehicle Rental Services
description: Short and long-term rental of passenger cars, 4x4 vehicles, and light utility vehicles. Flexible rental solutions for businesses, NGOs, and project teams.

name: Sale of Brand-New Vehicles
description: Supply and sale of brand-new passenger cars and utility vehicles. Official sourcing from manufacturers with full documentation and warranty.

name: Import of Goods
description: Importation of goods and equipment from international suppliers worldwide. Full customs handling, logistics coordination, and delivery to your location.

name: Export Activities
description: Export facilitation for local products, commodities, and goods. Documentation, compliance, and logistics managed for smooth international trade operations.

name: Fair Organization & General Services
description: Organization of trade fairs, professional events, and general logistical services. Complete event management from planning and setup through to execution and teardown.
